549070.name: Pinball FX2 VR - Season 1 Pack
549070.description: The Pinball FX2 VR Season One Pack adds five fan favorite tables to Pinball FX2 VR: CastleStorm, Wild West Rampage, BioLab, Paranormal and Earth Defense. Defeat your enemy’s soldiers and raze their castles with Sir Gareth on the CastleStorm table, defeat a crooked sheriff in a western showdown in Wild West Rampage, use your pinball skills to create a new alien species in BioLab, investigate a series of supernatural events in Paranormal, and save the planet from invading extraterrestrial forces in Earth Defense.  Each table has been recreated with the spectacular effects you can only experience in virtual reality!
549070.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
